definition: straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
in the past always/for a long time now/until now

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 过去的半个世纪内，美国一直是世界的面包篮子。

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年来政府一直保持棉花高价格。

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯从1982年起就一直在语言学院工作。

sentences.english: The temperature has not got cesse to rise up.
I've been keeping my room as neat as a pin, and the yard is always ship-shape.
sentences.chinese: 我一直保持房间井然有序，院子也是修得井井有条的。

sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 这些传统学科以及竹制武器的使用一直延续至今。

sentences.english: Just a few things off the top of my head regarding upgradable bags.
sentences.chinese: 一些关于背包升级的想法一直在我脑海里盘旋。

sentences.english: We can dance 'til the break of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以一直跳舞直到天明。

sentences.english: Carlo Ancelotti has often spoke highly of Ricardo and expressed his confidence in the striker.
sentences.chinese: 安切罗蒂一直对奥里韦拉有很高的信心。

sentences.english: They were always at the state of curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直处于好奇的状态。

sentences.english: Drache to confidential action content, therefore has not to clarify in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 卓凯为了保密行动内容，故一直没有就此事作出澄清。

sentences.english: The engine has been firing back.
I've been as busy as a bee all day doing my spring - cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 大扫除使得我一整天一直忙得不可开交。

sentences.english: Since 2002 she has drowned herself in the study of American literature.
sentences.chinese: 从2002年以来她一直埋头研究美国文学。

sentences.english: All along the disease is considered to be caused by abnormal swim bladders.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，该病都被认为是由鱼鳔异常引起的。

definition: in the past always/for a long time now/until now
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
